headline: Show HN: Have a question on your medication or supplement? Ask a pharmacist now
description:
Hey everyone!

On our focus:

So Uber is a technically complicated app for a simple idea: getting someone from point A to point B by connecting them with a freelance driver.

See this blog: "The Uber Engineering Tech Stack, Part I: The Foundation | Uber Blog" https://www.uber.com/blog/tech-stack-part-one-foundation/

Our Uber-inspired healthcare app aims to answer a patient's contextual medication-related question by connecting them with a freelance licensed pharmacist. The reviews and profiles of pharmacists and patients are features. They make us more approachable.

The thoughtful, contextual, and actionable answer is the key product. That's our destination.

Our ImpactPharm app is now available on the App Store on both Android and iOS/Apple for you to download:

Apple App Store: https://apps.apple.com/vn/app/impactpharm/id1624419611

Android App Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=us.impactpharm...

Please give us a try. Everyone has a free trial from now until Labor Day, September 5, 2022!

Please write us a review on the App Store and let us know whether:

> The information provided by your pharmacist is clear, helpful, and well researched.

> The app is readable and runs smoothly.

> You plan to continue using ImpactPharm.

> Using ImpactPharm improved your overall health and well-being.

> The care you received from ImpactPharm is worth more than what you paid to use this service.

And please tell us: Why will or will you not use this app again?

Thank you for your support!

Sophie Le, PharmD Co-founder & CEO ImpactPharm, Inc
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 对您的药物或补充剂有疑问吗？现在就咨询药剂师
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 對您的藥物或補充劑有疑問嗎？現在就諮詢藥劑師
description_zh-Hans:
Hey everyone!

On our focus:

So Uber is a technically complicated app for a simple idea: getting someone from point A to point B by connecting them with a freelance driver.

See this blog: "The Uber Engineering Tech Stack, Part I: The Foundation | Uber Blog" https://www.uber.com/blog/tech-stack-part-one-foundation/

Our Uber-inspired healthcare app aims to answer a patient's contextual medication-related question by connecting them with a freelance licensed pharmacist. The reviews and profiles of pharmacists and patients are features. They make us more approachable.

The thoughtful, contextual, and actionable answer is the key product. That's our destination.

Our ImpactPharm app is now available on the App Store on both Android and iOS/Apple for you to download:

Apple App Store: https://apps.apple.com/vn/app/impactpharm/id1624419611

Android App Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=us.impactpharm...

Please give us a try. Everyone has a free trial from now until Labor Day, September 5, 2022!

Please write us a review on the App Store and let us know whether:

> The information provided by your pharmacist is clear, helpful, and well researched.

> The app is readable and runs smoothly.

> 您计划继续使用ImpactPharm.

> 使用ImpactPharm改善了您的整体健康和福祉.

> 您从ImpactPharm得到的照顾比您为使用这项服务支付的费用更有价值.

而且请告诉我们。

感谢您的支持！

Sophie Le，PharmD，

请告诉我们：您为什么会或不会再次使用这个应用程序？ 联合创始人& CEO ImpactPharm, Inc
